description:
A durable tube that is ready to drop-in. Designed for enduro riding, but will also get you out of a scrape in any situation.

  • Burly 1.2mm wall thickness
  • Includes one glueless patch that doubles as a tire boot
  • Designed for 27.5+ tires with a width between 2.5 and 3in
  • Equipped with a 48mm presta valve
name: Rubbers 27.5+ x 2.5-3.0" Enduro Tube (48mm Presta Valve)
